From: 	Conklin, Michael
Sent: 	Monday, March 23, 2020 7:18 AM
To: 	'Samir Gupte'; 'Bruce Lowthers'
Cc: 	'Isaacman, Jared'; Taylor Lavery
Subject: 	Settlement

Samir/Bruce,

I am writing to inform you of an action that Fiserv has taken in regards to holding 100% of a mutual clients settlement for up to 35 days. This action effectively will shut down the independent software vendor without much notice. The challenge is there is not specific language in their standard agreement with the ISV that allows Fiserv to unilaterally hold 100% of their funds.

From a partnership stand point my ask is in two parts, first is having a call to understand why with no history or indication of challenges with this portfolio would the Fiserv risk organization institute a 35 day old on 100% of funds. Second, is to help us mitigate the concerns to get the mutual client the funds that they deserve and are owed.

I look forward to hearing from you.

Regards,
Mike
Mike Conklin
SVP, Enterprise Risk and Underwriting
